title: Celebrate with us
seo_description: Time to indulge with a bottle of champagne, chocolate-covered treats upon arrival and more.
short_description: Time to indulge with a bottle of champagne, chocolate-covered treats upon arrival and more.
full_description: Whether you are treating a special someone to a romantic getaway or enjoying a birthday fete, toast the occasion in one of our luxurious WestHouse Hotel New York guest rooms by indulging in a bottle of champagne and chocolate-covered treats upon arrival. A complimentary late check out of 2:00PM is also included.
